skill.name: theme-factory
skill.description: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML landing pages, etc. There are 10 pre-set themes with colors/fonts that you can apply to any artifact that has been creating, or can generate a new theme on-the-fly.
skill.summary: Toolkit for styling artifacts with a theme. These artifacts can be slides, docs, reportings, HTML la...
skill.author: Cam10001110101

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation-based theme catalog with no executable code. Contains only markdown files defining color palettes and font pairings. No security risks identified.

content.value_statement: Transform plain presentations into visually stunning decks with curated professional themes. Choose from 10 pre-designed themes with perfect color palettes and font pairings.
actual_capabilities: Apply 10 pre-built professional themes to presentations
Showcase themes via visual PDF catalog
Define color palettes with hex codes
Specify font pairings for headers and body text
limitations: Requires manual theme application - no automatic styling
Limited to 10 pre-set themes plus custom generation
Themes must be applied consistently across all slides

use_cases.title: Corporate presentation styling
use_cases.description: Apply Ocean Depths or Arctic Frost themes to financial reports and consulting decks for professional impact.

use_cases.title: Brand-aligned pitch decks
use_cases.description: Use Sunset Boulevard or Tech Innovation themes to create compelling pitches that match brand personality.

use_cases.title: Engaging course materials
use_cases.description: Select Forest Canopy or Botanical Garden themes for environmental or wellness content with natural appeal.

prompt_templates.title: Basic theme application
prompt_templates.scenario: Applying a theme to existing slides
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the theme showcase PDF, then apply the Ocean Depths theme to my presentation about Q4 financial results.

prompt_templates.title: Custom theme creation
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a custom theme for my luxury jewelry brand presentation. The brand colors are gold and deep burgundy.

prompt_templates.title: Theme comparison
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me the difference between Golden Hour and Desert Rose themes for my autumn fashion collection presentation.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-theme application
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the Tech Innovation theme to my AI startup pitch deck, but use Midnight Galaxy for the title slide only.

output_examples.input: Apply the Forest Canopy theme to my sustainability report
output: Primary color: Forest Green (#2d4a2b) for headers and key elements
Accent colors: Sage (#7d8471) and Olive (#a4ac86) for charts and highlights
Background: Ivory (#faf9f6) for clean, readable slides
Fonts: FreeSerif Bold for headers, FreeSans for body text
Applied consistently across all 15 slides with proper contrast ratios

best_practices: Preview themes in the showcase PDF before selection to ensure visual fit
Consider audience and context when choosing between professional or creative themes
Maintain consistent theme application across all slides for cohesive branding
anti_patterns: Mixing multiple themes within the same presentation without purpose
Ignoring readability contrast when applying themes to complex data visualizations
Selecting themes based only on personal preference without considering audience expectations

faq.question: Which AI tools support this theme factory skill?
faq.answer: Theme factory works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Any AI assistant that can read files and apply styling instructions can use these themes.

faq.question: Can I modify the existing themes or add my own?
faq.answer: Yes, you can create custom themes by describing your desired colors and fonts. The skill will generate new theme files similar to the existing 10 presets.

faq.question: Are these themes compatible with PowerPoint or Google Slides?
faq.answer: The themes provide color hex codes and font specifications that can be manually applied to any presentation software including PowerPoint, Google Slides, or Keynote.

faq.question: How do I ensure good contrast and readability?
faq.answer: Each theme is designed with proper contrast ratios. Follow the color usage guidelines in each theme file, using dark colors for text on light backgrounds and vice versa.

faq.question: What if none of the 10 themes fit my needs?
faq.answer: Request a custom theme generation. Describe your brand colors, industry, or desired mood and the skill will create a tailored theme with appropriate colors and fonts.

faq.question: Can I see all themes before choosing?
faq.answer: Yes, the theme-showcase.pdf file contains visual previews of all 10 themes. Always review this file first to make an informed selection based on your content and audience.
